caption: Detection Finding
description: Security Detection events describe findings, detections, anomalies, alerts and/or actions performed by security products.
name: detection

resources.description: Describes details about resources that were the target of the activity/activities that triggered the detection.

status.description: The normalized state of a security detection.

status_id.description: The normalized state identifier of a security detection.

1.caption: New
1.description: The detection is new and yet to be reviewed.

3.caption: Suppressed
3.description: The detection was reviewed, considered as a false positive and is now suppressed.

4.caption: Resolved
4.description: The detection was reviewed and remediated and is now considered resolved.
